size_t rs_job::scoop_avail

Definition at line 76 of file job.h.

char* rs_job::scoop_buf

Buffer of data in the scoop. Allocation is scoop_buf[0..scoop_alloc], and scoop_next[0..scoop_avail] contains data yet to be processed. scoop_next[scoop_pos..scoop_avail] is the data yet to be scanned.
